mapper.update: update zj_auction_stock_relation set auction_id = #{auctionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stock_number = #{stockNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, auction_id, stock_number, stock_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from zj_auction_stock_relation
